des:
Heatit WIFI thermostats are used to heat bathrooms and other rooms in houses. Thermostat contains integrated 16A relay, which connects 230VAC to heating element / heating matt in the floor based on heat requirements. Thermostat contains integrated room sensor and connector for floor sensor to monitor temperature.

Thermostat can be purchased from https://heatit.com/product/10191/smart-products/thermostats/heatit-wifi/1109.

Heatit WIFI application https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.thermofloor.heatitwifi can be used to remotely control the thermostat. Thermostat is connected via user Wifi to Amazon Web Services cloud backend. Application enables user to program temperature setpoints remotely and monitor temperatures. Also weekly schedule can be programmed by user. In addition, energy consumption trends and temperature alarms are available for user. Phone push notifications can be used for alarms.

Heatit WIFI skill for Amazon Alexa connects Heatit WIFI phone application to Alexa system. This enables voice control, grouping of thermostats to rooms and routines via Alexa.

The following commands will be provided for thermostats:
“Alexa, discover devices”
“Alexa change thermostat to HEAT”
“Alexa change thermostat to ECO”
“Alexa change thermostat to AUTO”
“Alexa set thermostat to 22 degrees”
“Alexa make thermostat warmer”
“Alexa increase thermostat temperature by 2 degrees”
“Alexa make thermostat cooler”
“Alexa reduce thermostat temperature by 2 degrees”
“Alexa, what is thermostat set to”
“Alexa, what is the temperature in thermostat”
